snippet: As lawmakers dither over reforms needed to cut ballooning deficits, the Postal Service wisely went ahead and eliminated Saturday delivery.
abstract: Editorial praises United States Postal Service for going ahead with long-debated plan to eliminate Saturday mail delivery, move that will save $2 billion a year.
lead_paragraph: As lawmakers dither over reforms needed to cut ballooning deficits, the Postal Service wisely went ahead and eliminated Saturday delivery.
